topic.title: Sharkey's Soft Pretzels
topic.shortdesc: Sharkey's soft pretzels are absolutely delicious and melt in your mouth! The have the perfect balance between soft inside and golden brown, salty exterior.

body.p: Sharkey's soft pretzels are now served with a chose of nacho cheese or their new hot honey mustard sauce. Sharkey's is a great place to spend on gameday and these pretzels are the perfect app!
